sql_query: SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T1.staff_gender FROM staff AS T1 JOIN Staff_Department_Assignments AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.staff_id WHERE T2.job_title_code  =  "Sales Person" EXCEPT SELECT T1.staff_name ,  T1.staff_gender FROM staff AS T1 JOIN Staff_Department_Assignments AS T2 ON T1.staff_id  =  T2.staff_id WHERE T2.job_title_code  =  "Clerical Staff"
question: What are the names and genders of staff members who are sales persons but not clerical staff?
